original_text: every now and again , a movie comes along to remind us of how very bad a motion picture can truly be . frank mcklusky c . i . is that movie !
generated_text:
1. "I just watched 'Gigli' and I'm still trying to scrub the memory from my brain. It's a cinematic abomination!"
2. "The movie 'Battlefield Earth' is a mind-numbing experience that left me questioning the sanity of its creators."
